DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study molecular quantitation sequence endometrial cytokine gene expression effect outcome in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Cycle
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Molecular Quantitation Sequencing Endometrial Cytokines Gene Expression Their Effect Outcome In-vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Cycle
DOC.detailed_description: The study perform Cairo IVE Unit ; Faculty medicine Cairo University 15 case . Inclusion criterion : age 23 -35 , FSH le 10 previous uterine operation , history poor response previous IVF sever male factor endometriosis uterine factor exclude . diabetes mellitus antral follicle count ( AFC ) > 5 undergoing IVF use standard long protocol . All patient give inform consent participate study . Endometrial tissue sample take day oocyte retrieval use soft suction plastic catheter . The menstrual blood 10 woman regular menstrual cycle apparent endometrial dysfunction take control sample . The study protocol inform consent approve Human Ethics Committee IVF department .of Kasar Ini hospital Total RNA isolation : Endometrial biopsy menstrual control blood lysed RLT buffer ( QIAGEN , Germantown , MD ) . The lysates prepare total RNA extraction use RNeasy mini kit ( QIAGEN , Germantown , MD ) accord manufacturer 's instruction . The RNA extract store -80ºC future use . RNA purity , yield , concentration determine dual spectrophotometry ( Beckman , USA ) , 1μg RNA run 1 % agarose gel ( Roche , Castle Hill , Australia ) ensure integrity RNA . Quantitative RT-PCR ( qRT-PCR ) : Reverse transcriptase ( RT ) reaction mixture use High Capacity Reverse Transcriptase kit ( Applied Biosystems , USA ) containing : 1 μg total RNA sample cDNA synthesis , 0.5 μg random primer , 5×RT buffer , 2.5 mmol/L dNTP , 20 U RNase inhibitor 200 U MMLV reverse transcriptase total volume 25 μl incubate 37ºC 60 minute , heat 95 ºC 5 minute inactivate MMLV . RT follow qPCR , 50 ng cDNA add 5 X Fast-Start SYBR green master mix Rox ( Roche Diagnostics , Indianapolis , IN ) 200 ng primer mix ( Sigma ) . The reaction carry micro optical plate ( Applied Biosystems ) analyze use StepOne real-time 203 PCR system ( Applied Biosystems ) . The PCR run method follow : 10 minute 950C enzyme activation follow 40 cycle 15 second 950C , 20 second 550C 30 second 720C amplification step . The primer use qRT-PCR evaluation specific target gene ( table 1 ) . Relative mRNA expression calculate comparative cycle threshold method . outline manufacturer 's user manual GAPDH house-keeping gene . The fluorescence plot versus PCR cycle number reaction sample indicate . Serum hormonal level assay : FSH , LH E2 estimate ELISA accord instruction manufacturer . DNA purification sequence analysis : IL-11 LIF gene analyze direct sequence PCR product use SEQr kit . ( Applied Biosystems ) , accord manufacturer 's protocol . PCR product purify use QIAquick Gel Extraction Kit ( QIAGEN ) . The relevant purified DNA sample case control amplify sequence use automate sequence aid Big Dye Terminator Sequencing Kit ( PE/Applied Biosystems , Foster City , CA ) . The sample run automate sequencer ABI Prism 310 Avant ( PE/Applied Biosystems ) .. All sample sequence twice ensure result . Statistical analysis : Data statistically describe term mean standard deviation , median range . Comparison woman could achieve pregnancy n't do use Mann Whitney U test independent sample . Correlation various variable do use Spearman rank correlation equation non-normal variable .
DOC.criteria: FSH LESS THAN 10 , NO SEVER MALE FACTOR endometriosis , DM previous uterine surgery .
